attributes.action: Campaign to save Britannia from our 50p coin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Campaign to save Britannia from our 50p coin. Please sign the petition to save our heritage of Great Britain.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
